incident_updates.body: A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.
Our technical teams always investigate to determine the origin of this incident

Service impact : Ongoing actions : We are observing a high number of notifications of attempted DDoS attacks on the Beauharnois datacenter. The first investigation indicates that these notifications are false positives. The protection is still functional for all your services. Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be post as significant progress is made.
